name: Bus Simulator - Multiplayer
description:
YOUR BUS. YOUR COMPANY. YOUR WORLD.

Are you ready to start a new adventure on the roads along the East Coast? Then be prepared to create your own bus empire in our latest title, Bus Simulator Pro which comes with super realistic driving physics, endless customization choices, huge open world, and fun and addictive gameplay!


REAL BUS PHYSICS

Feel like a real bus driver in Bus Simulator Pro in which we aimed to combine the realism and satisfaction of driving a real bus to create the most sophisticated bus simulator on mobile with our most advanced physics engine to date.


LIVE PASSENGER FEEDBACK

With the help of our advanced AI, for the first time ever on mobile, you'll get to experience live passenger feedback while driving your favorite bus. While completing the vast number of routes, be careful not to displease your passengers as they should be your top priority.


EXTENSIVE CUSTOMIZATION

Design your own bus to display your creativity to all! With the provided countless customization options of vinyls, rims, platings, paint, and bus parts, your dream bus is at your fingertips for you to create. The only limit is your imagination! Extreme customization is waiting for you!


BRAND NEW OPEN WORLD

The vast open world was created to test your ultimate bus driving skills meanwhile providing the best bus driving gameplay experience on mobile.

With our biggest map to date, you'll experience up-close the exciting everyday life of a coach bus driver in a massive and freely drivable open world with extremely detailed environment, three massive, freely explorable cities, scenic roads along the countryside, and a lot of surprises for you to discover.


REAL ATMOSPHERE

Experience the ultimate realism thanks to our improved graphics, day/night cycle, new dynamic weather, real life sounds and our most refined pedestrian and traffic system to date. With Bus Simulator Pro, you'll be able to immerse yourself in our brand new world and forget you're driving your bus on a phone!


VAST SELECTION OF BUSES

From classic to iconic to concept ones that were created by our talented designers, pick your favorite bus to either drive around freely to have fun or complete your missions to level up and become the king of the road!
